rComments: Lucas was soooo awesome!!! before the class I did not like poetry, but now I love it and write it for fun!!!  He really cares about your writing and gives you great feedback,

Lucas is a cool guy. He cares about students and wants your writing to improve with his class. Some of the readings were boring, but that was made up for in the in class discussions. He is a grad student in Philosophy so he likes when you express your random or deep thoughts. He is a great teacher and the class really helped my writing!
